TopicTitle: Curse link on website - doesn't tell you what Curse is.

Articles.Content:
The link to Curse on the website sits under community, but the link simply says Curse. That's fine for people familiar with the Curse website and what it does, or for those of us that were here during the launch, but for new players, the link doesn't tell them what curse is or what it's used for.

It might be better to change the menu or the way the link is displayed so that it's more obvious that Curse is the depository for player created mods and add-ons.

Personally I would include a permanent link image, in the space below Purchase and Kerbalizer, letting people know that mods are a thing and that they can be found at curse.

Actually I would put it between the purchase section and the Kerbalizer as the latter IMO needs updating to bring it up the standard of polish 0.23.5 has.
Ugh, it goes to curse.com rather than curseforge.com like the forum link.

Thanks for the headsup. We're woking on a quick solution as I type this.

Edit: Aaaand fixed. Thanks Paul!
